recipesJson.name: HAZMAT CUSTARD
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: This is a really simple strait forward recipe very delicious and decadent  hazelnut cinnamon custard goes good with a cup of your favorite coffee...

reviews.text: Badass recipe. I just love CAP's Vanilla Custard and Cinnamon Danish Swirl so this hit my sweet spot. Ethyl Maltol does wonders! Thank you!
very simple and amazing recipe. I used to mix a lot of custard with bavarian cream and CDS back in time. This one hits a nostalgic spot. It is really good.
